List all male individuals older than 30 years.
MySQL: SELECT * FROM adult_preprocessed WHERE sex = 'Male' AND age > 30;

NLQuery: List all female individuals older than 30 years.
MySQL: SELECT * FROM adult_preprocessed WHERE sex = 'Female' AND age > 30;

NLQuery: List all people who work more than 20 hours per week.
List all people who work more than 30 hours per week.
List all people who work more than 40 hours per week.
List all people who work more than 50 hours per week.
List all people who work more than 60 hours per week.
Compute the average age of all individuals.
MySQL: SELECT AVG(age) AS avg_age FROM adult_preprocessed;

NLQuery: Compute the average age of female individuals.
MySQL: SELECT AVG(age) AS avg_age FROM adult_preprocessed WHERE sex = 'Female';

NLQuery: Compute the average age of male individuals.
MySQL: SELECT AVG(age) AS avg_age FROM adult_preprocessed WHERE sex = 'Male';

NLQuery: Count how many people there are for each education level.
MySQL: SELECT education, COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM adult_preprocessed GROUP BY education;

NLQuery: Count the number of distinct education levels.
MySQL: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT education) AS distinct_education_levels FROM adult_preprocessed;

NLQuery: Compute the average number of hours worked per week.
MySQL: SELECT AVG(`hours-per-week`) AS avg_hours_per_week FROM adult_preprocessed;

NLQuery: Compute the maximum capital gain value.
MySQL: SELECT MAX(`capital-gain`) AS max_capital_gain FROM adult_preprocessed;

NLQuery: Compute the average capital gain by workclass.
MySQL: SELECT workclass, AVG(`capital-gain`) AS avg_capital_gain FROM adult_preprocessed GROUP BY workclass;

NLQuery: Count how many individuals there are for each combination of race and sex.
MySQL: SELECT race, sex, COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM adult_preprocessed GROUP BY race, sex;

NLQuery: Compute the average age for each race.
MySQL: SELECT race, AVG(age) AS avg_age FROM adult_preprocessed GROUP BY race;

Count how many individuals are marked as 'Husband' in the relationship column.
MySQL: SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM adult_preprocessed WHERE relationship = 'Husband';

NLQuery: Group individuals into age buckets of 10 years and count how many people fall into each bucket.
MySQL:
SELECT FLOOR(age / 10) * 10 AS age_bucket,
       COUNT(*) AS cnt
FROM adult_preprocessed
GROUP BY FLOOR(age / 10) * 10
ORDER BY age_bucket;

NLQuery: Compute the average number of hours worked per week for each sex.
MySQL: SELECT sex, AVG(`hours-per-week`) AS avg_hours FROM adult_preprocessed GROUP BY sex;

Compute the maximum capital loss value.
MySQL: SELECT MAX(`capital-loss`) AS max_capital_loss FROM adult_preprocessed;

NLQuery: Compute the average capital loss grouped by race.
MySQL: SELECT race, AVG(`capital-loss`) AS avg_capital_loss FROM adult_preprocessed GROUP BY race;

List all male individuals older than 40 with an education-num greater than 10.
MySQL: SELECT * FROM adult_preprocessed WHERE sex = 'Male' AND age > 40 AND `education-num` > 10;

NLQuery: List all female individuals younger than 30 with an education-num of at least 12.
MySQL: SELECT * FROM adult_preprocessed WHERE sex = 'Female' AND age < 30 AND `education-num` >= 12;

NLQuery: List all individuals who work between 30 and 50 hours per week.
MySQL: SELECT * FROM adult_preprocessed WHERE `hours-per-week` BETWEEN 30 AND 50;

NLQuery: Count how many individuals work less than 20 hours per week.
MySQL: SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM adult_preprocessed WHERE `hours-per-week` < 20;
